text: Benjamin McKenzie Schenkkan (born September 12, 1978) is an American comedian, actor and producer. He is also known as Benjamin McKenzie and Ben McKenzie, and was born in Austin, Texas.Benjamin McKenzie Us Weekly Magazine Biography. He plays Ryan Atwood in the television series The O.C. and Ben Sherman in Southland. He has also appeared on the television show, Gotham. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Comedians from Austin, Texas Category:Actors from Austin, Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Benjamin McKenzie
